page.title: 03A Day in the Life.
page.content: I am Lee Openshaw. On a typical day for me I would get up at 7.30 and get ready for school. Then I go downstairs and have my Frosties for breakfast. I read the paper and watch TV-AM until 8.30. I leave for school and get there at 8.45 and play football until 9.00. School starts then and we work until 10.30. Playtime - I play football until 10.45. We work until 12.30 then I have my dinner and play football until 1.30. We work until 2.30 and play until 2.45. We come back in and work until 3.20. Then we tidy up and go home at 3.30. I get changed and when I'm ready I call for Ian and we play until 5.45. I have my tea and then practice my organ until 6.30. I play out until 8.00 and watch television until 9.30. Then I go to bed at 10.00.
